author: Staff Reporter
text:
V. Balan, chairman of the Government owned Anglo French Textiles (AFT) has resigned.

“I have relinquished the post to concentrate on party work in view of the forthcoming Assembly elections,” he said. Mr. Balan submitted his resignation to Chief Minister N. Rangasamy.

Referring to the recent verdict of the Madras High Court giving the green signal to dispose of lands of the mill in Pattanur, he deemed it to be an important achievement service during his tenure.
title: Balan, chairman of AFT, resigns
